title: Support for Relative Paths in XML File Selection
description: When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths.
OB: When selecting an XML file, the system only supports absolute file paths. It does not support relative paths.
EB: The expected behavior is that when selecting an XML file, both relative and absolute file paths should be supported.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset based on an XML file.
